decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (WD-1000, WD-1001, WD-1002, WD-1010, WD-1020, WD-2000, WD-2002, WD-2010, WD-2020. Received: 14/12/2015. Flood Risk Assessment (December 2015), Received: 16/12/2015. Flood Risk Assessment (January 2016), Flood Risk Assessment (January 2011), Received: 06/01/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey rear infill extension to the house
